command.name: mcast-group
command.help: Set a multicast group related property

argument.name: dmac-vlan
argument.help: Create a Layer 2 multicast group

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: The group (or range of groups) to set the group address for

argument.name: !<DMAC>
argument.help: The multicast destination MAC in the form XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX

argument.name: !<vid>
argument.help: A VLAN ID in the range 1-4095

argument.name: !<vid2>
argument.help: Optional VLAN ID2 in the range 0-4095

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: The group (or range of groups) to set the group address for

argument.name: !<destination>
argument.help: The multicast destination IP address in CIDR format

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: The group (or range of groups) to set the group address for

argument.name: !<destination>
argument.help: The multicast destination IP address in CIDR format

argument.name: !<vlan>
argument.help: A VLAN ID (or range of VLAN IDs) in the form X/X

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: The group (or range of groups) set the group address for

argument.name: !<destination>
argument.help: The multicast destination IP address in CIDR format

argument.name: !<source>
argument.help: The source IP address in CIDR format

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: The group (or range of groups) set the group address for

argument.name: !<destination>
argument.help: The multicast destination IP address in CIDR format

argument.name: !<source>
argument.help: The source IP address in CIDR format

argument.name: !<vlan>
argument.help: A VLAN ID (or range of VLAN IDs) in the form X/X

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: The group (or range of groups) to set the group address for

argument.name: L2SwitchOnly
argument.help: Set if the multicast group will be use in L2 switching or L3 routing mode

argument.name: on
argument.help: Multicast group will run in L2 switch mode

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Multicast group will run in L2 switch mode

argument.name: off
argument.help: Multicast group will run in L3 route mode

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Multicast group will run in L3 route mode

argument.name: L3SwitchOnly
argument.help: Switching of L3 traffic with packet replication per VLAN

argument.name: on
argument.help: Enable switching with packet replication per VLAN

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Enable switching with packet replication per VLAN

argument.name: off
argument.help: Disable switching with packet replication per VLAN

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Disable switching with packet replication per VLAN

argument.name: L3Flood-set
argument.help: Multicast group defines an L3 flood-set

argument.name: on
argument.help: Enable multicast group as an L3 flood-set

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Enable multicast group as an L3 flood-set

argument.name: off
argument.help: Disable multicast group as an L3 flood-set

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Disable multicast group as an L3 flood-set

argument.name: repli-group
argument.help: Associate a replication group with this multicast group

argument.name: private
argument.help: Multicast group does not share a replication group

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Multicast group does not share a replication group

argument.name: !<repli-group>
argument.help: Replication group to associate with the mcast group

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Associate replication group with this multicast group

argument.name: bypassEgressSTP
argument.help: Vlan replication should be added regardless of the egress STP state

argument.name: on
argument.help: Enable bypass of egress STP check

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Enable bypass of egress STP check

argument.name: off
argument.help: Disable bypass of egress STP check

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Disable bypass of egress STP check

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: The group (or range of groups) to activate/deactivate

argument.name: active
argument.help: Activate the specified Multicast group

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Activate the specified Multicast group

argument.name: inactive
argument.help: Deactivate the specified Multicast group

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Activate the specified Multicast group

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: A range of multicast groups

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Display multicast group information

argument.name: all
argument.help: Display multicast group information for all groups

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Display multicast group information for all groups

command.name: del
command.help: Delete MAC address, VLANs, LAGs, or ports from VLANs, or counters from VLANs or LAGs

command.name: mcast-group
command.help: Delete a multicast group or listeners from a group

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: The group to delete

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Delete a multicast group

command.name: mcast-listener
command.help: Delete a listener from a group

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: The group to delete a listener from

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: The listener's port

argument.name: !<vlan>
argument.help: The listener's VLAN ID

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Delete a listener from a multicast group

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: The replication group to delete

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Delete a replication group

command.name: mcast-ecmp
command.help: Delete an ECMP from a multicast group

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: The multicast group to delete an ECMP from

argument.name: !<ecmp>
argument.help: The ECMP to delete

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Delete an ECMP from a multicast group

command.name: create
command.help: Create VLANs, LAGs, multicast groups, ACLs, etc.

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Create a multicast group

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Create a replication group

command.name: add
command.help: Add mac addresses to MA table, or ports to VLANs or LAGs

command.name: mcast-listener
command.help: Add listeners to a multicast group

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: The group (or range of groups) to add a listener to

argument.name: !<port>
argument.help: The listener's port

argument.name: !<vlan>
argument.help: The listener's VLAN ID

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Add a listener to a multicast group

argument.name: !<remote>
argument.help: Remote Flag (on or off)

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Add a listener to a multicast group

command.name: mcast-ecmp
command.help: Add an ecmp to a multicast group

argument.name: !<group>
argument.help: The multicast group to add an ECMP to

argument.name: !<vlan>
argument.help: Then VLAN ID to be used for loopback suppression

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Add an ECMP to a multicast group
